import React, { useState } from 'react'; import profilePic from '../images/Sebas-dog.jpeg'; const Edit = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ name: "", username: "", email: "", }); const handleChange = e => { setInputs(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.t})) } return (
) } export default Edit
